text: Yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 49. Should any bhikkhunī study lowly arts (literally, bestial knowledge), it is to be confessed. [Cv.V.33.2 — for a list of lowly arts, see DN 2]
